example.distinct
from T_MERCHANT
order by ${example.orderByClause}

update T_MERCHANT
MERCHANT_ID = #{record.merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MCC_ID = #{record.mccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MRCHT_NAME = #{record.mrchtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABBR_CNAME = #{record.abbrCname,jdbcType=CHAR},

TELEPHONE = #{record.telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ACC_NAME = #{record.accName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
